titles.title: To prohibit the Office of Federal Detention Trustee from constructing Federal detention centers and to prohibit the Department of Justice from siting a detention center or Federal prison in Maryland, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: 12/8/2003--Introduced. Prohibits: (1) the Office of Federal Detention Trustee of the Department of Justice from expending any funds for the construction of, or the solicitation of construction proposals for, any Federal detention center; and (2) the Attorney General from constructing or acquiring any property or facilities in Maryland to be used as a detention center or Federal prison.
